    Moving Drones for Wireless Coverage in a Three-Dimensional Grid Analyzed via Game Theory

    Published in: 2021 IEEE Asia Pacific Conference on on Circuits and Systems (APCCAS)

    This paper analyzes the movement of drones for wireless coverage in a 3D grid using game theory.
